message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. It's a valuable piece and I believe it's worth every penny. I'm confident this price will be mutually beneficial. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. It's a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but $900,000 doesn't quite cover my costs.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $925,000. It's still a great deal for you, and it allows me to make a fair profit.  Let's work together to finalize this deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $915,000. I believe this price is fair and reasonable, and I'm confident we can finalize the deal at this price.
